author: Roberta Souza
title: Do you want to work from the comfort of your home, receive R$6.000 in compensation and up to R$1.820 in benefits? Port√ºs Digital is opening a selection process for a home office position!
text:
Attractive opportunity for a senior marketing analyst working from home in an innovative digital market company
A
[Digital Portugues](https://en.clickpetroleoegas.com.br/goodbye-fan-and-air-conditioning%2C-learn-about-radiant-ceilings-and-how-to-cool-your-home-economically/), a reference in recruitment and selection in digital market, is offering a remote vacancy for Senior Marketing Analyst.
This position is essential for the company, which stands out in the evidence-based psychology sector in Brazil.
With an fixed salary of R$6.000, in addition to benefits that can reach $ 1.820 monthly, this is an unmissable opportunity for marketing professionals.
Job Description and Responsibilities
O Senior Marketing Analyst will have as main responsibilities the creation and optimization of sales funnels and automations.
The professional will be responsible for developing strategies that improve customer journeys, with the aim of maximizing campaign results.
Monitoring metrics will be crucial, and the candidate must monitor the performance of campaigns, generating reports that ensure compliance with all KPIs.
Responsibilities include:
- Constant analysis of creatives such as emails, ads and landing pages.
- Transform data into actionable insights for continuous improvement.
- Collaborate with other internal teams to ensure synergy of strategies.
Necessary Skills
Technical requirements
To apply for remote vacancy, the ideal is to have consolidated experience in campaigns digital marketing industry, especially when launching products and services.
Mastery of email marketing tools, such as RD Station e ActiveCampaign, is fundamental.
Additionally, the candidate must be familiar with analysis tools such as Excel, to measure the success of campaigns.
Behavioral requirements
A Digital Portugues highly values behavioral aspects. The candidate must be:
- Extremely responsible and proactive.
- Able to work independently.
- Detailed, as the clarity and impact of each message are essential.
- Resilient, especially during periods of high demand.
Benefits and work model of home office
A remote vacancy offers a series of benefits which make the proposal even more attractive. In addition to the fixed salary of R$6.000, employees have access to:
- Food allowance de R$1.320.
- Home office assistance de R$500.
- Childcare assistance de R$250 per child enrolled in a private daycare center.
Another advantage is the possibility of a annual bonus from to 3 salaries, which motivates the continuous growth of professionals.
Flexibility in home office work
One of the great attractions of this remote vacancy is the flexibility of schedules due to the home office.
A Digital Portugues allows professionals to adjust their schedules, as long as they meet their deliveries with quality and on time.
This model is ideal for those looking for a better balance between personal and professional life.
Opportunity for growth at Port√ºs Digital
A Digital Portugues is a company that promotes a dynamic and collaborative environment, where the exchange of ideas and innovation are constant.
Working from home in a company that is at the forefront of digital transformation in the evidence-based psychology market offers an excellent opportunity for growth.
The company also invests in the continuous development of its employees, reflecting its culture of seeking constant improvement.
This translates into multiple opportunities for learning and growth.
To sign up,
[CLICK HERE](https://jobs.quickin.io/portusdigital/jobs/67655669a543070014c4f763) üëàüëàüëà
Don't miss the chance to join a leading company in the sector and sign up now!

author: Editor Two
title: 2nd Amendment victory: Appeals court restores right to carry in California
text: by WorldTribune Staff / [247 Real News](https://www.worldtribune.com/category/breaking/) January 7, 2024 A 9th Circuit Court of Appeals panel has blocked a new California law, SB-2, that bans people from carrying firearms in most public places. A three-judge panel on Saturday dissolved a temporary hold on a lower court injunction blocking the law. The hold was issued by a different 9th Circuit panel and had allowed the law to go into effect on Jan. 1. Saturday‚Äôs decision keeps in place a Dec. 20 ruling by U.S. District Judge Cormac Carney blocking the law. Carney said that it violates the Second Amendment and that gun rights groups would likely prevail in proving it unconstitutional. The stay had allowed the Democrats in power in California to implement dozens of expansive ‚Äúgun-free‚Äù zones at the beginning of the year, including one on every piece of private property unless the owner explicitly authorized gun carry. Critics said the cumulative effect of the new ‚Äúsensitive places‚Äù restrictions in the law added up to an effective ban on gun carry. ‚ÄúThe right to carry in California was unconstitutionally eliminated for almost a week,‚Äù Kostas Moros, a lawyer for plaintiffs California Pistol and Rifle Association, told The Reload. ‚ÄúWe are relieved the status quo has been restored and Californians with CCW permits, who are among the most law-abiding people there are, can resume carrying as they have for years.‚Äù Carney found SB2 ‚Äúunconstitutionally deprive‚Äù permitholders ‚Äúof their constitutional right to carry a handgun in public for self-defense.‚Äù He further accused California of intentionally ignoring and undermining the Supreme Court‚Äôs decision in 2022‚Äôs New York State Rifle and Pistol Association v. Bruen, which established carrying a gun for self-defense is protected by the Constitution. ‚ÄúSB2‚Äôs coverage is sweeping, repugnant to the Second Amendment, and openly defiant of the Supreme Court,‚Äù Carney, a George W. Bush appointee, wrote. ‚ÄúThe law designates twenty-six categories of places, such as hospitals, public transportation, places that sell liquor for on-site consumption, playgrounds, parks, casinos, stadiums, libraries, amusement parks, zoos, places of worship, and banks, as ‚Äòsensitive places‚Äô where concealed carry permitholders cannot carry their handguns. SB2 turns nearly every public place in California into a ‚Äòsensitive place,‚Äô effectively abolishing the Second Amendment rights of law-abiding and exceptionally qualified citizens to be armed and to defend themselves in public.‚Äù The panel could still reconsider part of the stay before arguments in the case are actually heard. Those arguments are currently scheduled to occur in April. author: Tchadas Leo
title: ‚ÄòBest way to start the new year‚Äô: Island polar bear plunges make a big splash to ring in 2024
text: The Salish Sea‚Äôs frigid waters don‚Äôt typically seem inviting during winter, but on New Year‚Äôs Day, many people across Vancouver Island are brave enough to make a splash. Several Island communities organized polar bear swim events to help those who wish to shock their body with cold water to start 2024 off on the right foot. In Sidney, approximately 1,000 people showed up to either spectate or participate in the polar bear swim. Christina Lech from the Peninsula Celebration Society hoped the event would show people that it‚Äôs not as hard as it looks to take the plunge. ‚ÄúYou actually feel amazing coming out of the water. It‚Äôs hard to breathe when you are in the water, but when you do come out, you feel like a million bucks,‚Äù exclaimed Lech. READ ALSO: [At the stroke of midnight, the New Year gives a clean slate for long-elusive resolutions](https://www.cheknews.ca/at-the-stroke-of-midnight-the-new-year-gives-a-clean-slate-for-long-elusive-resolutions-1183959/) On Jan. 1, the waters around the Island averaged about 9 degrees Celsius. Despite cold temperatures, it didn‚Äôt stop organizer Karine Godbout from organizing the swim out on Dallas Point Road in Victoria. ‚ÄúMy core group of swimmers is about 15 people, so to have that many people is awesome. I think it‚Äôs the best way to start the new year,‚Äù Godbout told CHEK News. ‚ÄúIf you had a little bit too much of a drink last night or too much partying, you can start fresh with the cold water.‚Äù Other polar bear swims on and around the Island were organized in Port Alberni, Nanaimo and Parksville, as well as near the Cowichan River and on Pender Island. Polar bear swims were also held [in communities across Canada](https://www.cheknews.ca/canadians-across-country-expected-to-celebrate-new-years-day-with-polar-bear-swim-1184046/).
